LicenseService.description: The LicenseService schema describes the license service and the properties for the service itself with a link to the collection of licenses.  The license service also provides methods for installing licenses in a Redfish service.
LicenseService.longDescription: This resource shall represent an license service and the properties that affect the service itself for a Redfish implementation.

title: #LicenseService.LicenseService
